alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 4:33AM EDT until April 08 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek At Mount Marion. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The Esopus Creek spills over its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 AM EDT Friday was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this morning to 18.1 feet and then begin rising this evening. It will then rise above flood stage late tonight to 20.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will fall below flood stage again early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Mount Marion Flood Stage: 20.0 Observed Stage at Fri 3 am: 21.1 Forecast: Fri 2 am MSG Fri 8 am 20.6 Fri 2 pm 19.2 Fri 8 pm 18.1 Sat 2 am 19.8 Sat 8 am 20.4 Sat 2 pm 20.0 Sat 8 pm 19.6 Sun 2 am 19.2 Sun 8 am 18.8 Sun 2 pm 18.6 Sun 8 pm 18.3 &&
